name: localai
description: LocalAI is a self-hosted artificial intelligence inference engine that runs LLMs locally with no external API calls. It supports model selection, GPU acceleration, and provides an API compatible with OpenAI.
features: Local LLM Inference: Run AI models locally, No external API calls, GPU acceleration. Private AI on your hardware.
OpenAI Compatible: Drop-in replacement API, Compatible clients, Easy migration. Use existing tools with local models.
Model Support: Multiple LLM formats, Custom models, Model management. Flexible AI model deployment.
Self-Hosted: Complete privacy, No data sharing, Offline capable. Own your AI infrastructure.
